Class WhiteBlock

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Block
          WhiteBlock

public class WhiteBlock
extends Block

RedBlock is a child class of class Block. It inherits most of its functionality from class Block, and only defines what is different. If the ship hits the WhiteBlock, the lower part of the block disappears, along with all lower blocks.
